name: Zombie Arena (Vije)
description:
Zombie Arena is a prototype shooter made to work on shooting sensations.

Each party launch generates a new arena. The game currently features four weapons available (one in every ten killed zombies).

Movements: ZQSD or WASD keys.
Choice of weapons: 1,2,3,4 keys.

Click to start the game, click to reset the level when you are dead.

Thanks !
